html.body: Await a new user move contribution of the user
Start planning the response to this incoming user move
Reset the values and allow the detection of the next user move

First abort any possible still running utterance or behavior of the avatar. Then show some listening behavior, no matter if an agent move has been planned or not. Thus the agent is polite and does not try to interrupt the user while the user is speaking.

Show some speaker behavior while the user is not speaking. If there has been a contribution planned in the addressee role or if there is coming up a contribution during the speaker role, then this contribution is played back. However, as soon as the user starts speaking again, the contribution is aborted and the role is switched back.

The idle behavior depends on the information state. If the agent is just listening without having a contribution then he does some standard listening behavior. If there has been planned a contribution or such a contribution is coming up while listening then this should be shown via appropriate behaviors.
